body_html:
Yeah. @goldsborough do you see any obvious way in which I did this wrong?

wjakob wrote his own cmake integration of tbb and every once in a while ports over a new version. This is what our current setup is based on. But really I rather the Intel one works.

wjakob wrote his own cmake integration of tbb and every once in a while ports over a new version. This is what our current setup is based on. But really I rather the Intel one works.
body:
Yeah. @goldsborough do you see any obvious way in which I did this wrong?  

wjakob wrote [his own cmake integration](https://github.com/wjakob/tbb) of tbb and every once in a while ports over a new version. This is what our current setup is based on. But really I rather the Intel one works.
